availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Oldham County, Kentucky, cooper. Fleming County, Kentucky, native. Son of Philip Dick. Married to Martha Roberts Dick in Oldham County, Kentucky, on December 3, 1833. Married to Zerelda Stephens Dick. Father of Philip Silas Dick, C. W. Dick, Joseph B. Dick, and Samuel Dick. Cooper in Oldham County, Kentucky, in 1850. Cooper in Oldham County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Oldham County, Division 1, p. 125A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Oldham County, p. 902.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Oldham County, Brownsboro, p. 16A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994051, Oldham County Births.
Birth and Death Records: Covington, Lexington, Louisville, and Newport (before 1911), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 7019184, Fayette County Deaths, p. 785.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Oldham County Marriages, Film 000482442.
